name: Nyctophilia
description: Nyctophilia was born a long time ago. In that period, life started to falling apart.  All I thought were certainties started to crumble.   Suddenly I was alone, felt sad and with black pain in my heart.  Time moved slow.   Drinking - smoking - drawing: my life was punctuated by this rhythm.  Every night I was at the desk to take my mind off, every night.   I finally woke up from nightmares.  I was depressed and could see only darkness around me.  Nyctophilia is a page of my life history but at the same time,  is a hymn to the powerful regenerative magic of the night,  that saved me from the brink.
